name: Family Ties
text: Give to the Shang-Chi player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Deal 2 damage to Shang-Chi → remove Family Ties from the game. • Deal 2 damage to each ally. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "Save your pity for yourself...you'll get none from me."
name: Zheng Zu
text: Forced Response: After Zheng Zu schemes, place 1 mystic counter here. [star] Zheng Zu gets +1 ATK for each mystic counter here. (Shang-Chi's nemesis minion.)

flavor: Zheng Zu is casting a ritual to restore himself to full power. Don't let it happen!
name: The Life Stealer
text: Victory 1. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 mystic counter here. After a third mystic counter is placed here, deal 3 indirect damage to each hero and ally in play and remove The Life Stealer from the game.

flavor: "My father has always been a terrorist." —Shang-Chi
name: Downtown Attack
text: When Revealed: Remove an ally or [[PERSONA]] card in play from the game. If no card was removed from the game this way, take 3 indirect damage or discard 3 cards from your hand. Then, remove this card from the game.
